Introduction

Overview.

I am a highly motivated Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in dynamic and fast-paced environments. My expertise spans the complete technology stack, from crafting intuitive user interfaces to building robust backend systems. I specialize in the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js) with proficiency in PostgreSQL for relational database management.

Beyond traditional web development, I've integrated Python-based data science, AI, and machine learning capabilities into modern applications. My experience with Docker ensures seamless containerization and deployment, while my React Native expertise enables cross-platform mobile development with RESTful APIs and sophisticated state management using Redux and Context API.
